product_name: REI Merino Wool Light Hiker II Socks - Women's - 2012 Seconds
long_description: With naturally wicking fibers, the lightweight and cushioned Merino Wool Light Hiker II socks from REI are a great fit for hiking and backpacking. Merino lambswool with nylon and spandex provides durability and dependable fit. Stretch nylon reinforces heel and toe area for durability and comfort; arch bands lend additional support. Uniquely formed toe area and Lin-Toe(R) ''no-feel'' seams keep socks smooth and nonirritating. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: With naturally wicking fibers, the lightweight and cushioned Merino Wool Light Hiker II socks from REI are a great fit for hiking and backpacking.
